Toasted = "0:255=#[128,128,128]"

/* Dead Pony Props */

White = "80:95=80:99", "200:207=100:107"
Gray = "80:95=96:105", "200:207=87:95"
DarkGray = "80:95=103:111", "200:207=87:95"

LightishRed = "80:95=16:33", "200:207=39:47"
Red = "80:95=24:39", "200:207=100:107"

Blue = "80:95=193:200", "200:207=240:247"

LimeGreen = "80:95=112:122", "200:207=119:127"
Green = "80:95=119:127", "200:207=103:111"

Orange = "80:95=212:223", "200:207=144:151"
Beige = "80:95=55:68", "200:207=152:159"
Brown = "80:95=134:143", "200:207=87:95"
